data.name: Bag Republic UA
data.description:
Bag Republic UA пропонує широкий асортимент стильних та якісних сумок і аксесуарів для щоденного використання та подорожей. Партнери отримують можливість заробляти на продажах жіночих та чоловічих сумок, рюкзаків, гаманців, ременів та валіз.

Асортимент на сайті:


	Жіночі сумки
	Чоловічі сумки
	Рюкзаки
	Гаманці
	Ремені
	Валізи


Переваги для партнерів:


	Конкурентні комісійні ставки
	Великий вибір товарів для різних аудиторій
	Зручні промо-матеріали та посилання
	Постійне оновлення асортименту


Цільова аудиторія:
Чоловіки та жінки, які цінують стиль, якість та зручність, а також ті, хто часто подорожує.

data.name: The Park [CPS] IN
data.description:
Company Description: THE Park, pioneers of luxury boutique hotels for 50 years, is present in India's major cities and tourist destinations. Each hotel is unique, a distinctive interpretation of contemporary India that gives guests an experience that is Anything But Ordinary. Situated in prime locations, they house some of India's most happening nightclubs, liveliest bars and inventive restaurants.The Park is also home to the Aura Spa, a much-vaunted rejuvenation venue. Paintings, sculptures and installations adorn rooms and corridors, and the deisgn driven aesthetic can be felt across the hotels. Along with constant product and service innovation, the Group also focuses on relevant social issues and nurtures art and culture in each region. They respect the environment and take significant steps to protect it.

The Park Hotels is managed by the family-owned Apeejay Surrendra Group. Established in 1910, The Apeejay Surrendra Group has its foundations in steel. Its current activities include shipping, tea, retail, real estate and construction, hospitality and finance.

Target Geo : PAN India

data.name: Oberoi Hotels [CPS] IN
data.description:
Company Description: Introducing the Oberoi Hotels and Resorts Affiliate Program to all publishers. This is a global luxury hotel company operating in 5 exotic destinations: India, Indonesia, Mauritius, Dubai and Egypt.

Oberoi Hotels & Resorts has been voted World's Best Hotel Brand for the second consecutive year by the readers of ‘Travel + Leisure in 2016 World's Best Awards’. They have established a reputation for redefining the paradigm of luxury and excellence in service amongst leisure hotels around the world. By promoting this program you are ensuring a great source of revenue!

Target Geo : PAN India

Key Selling Points of Oberoi Hotels and Resorts Affiliate Program:


	Good commission percentage on each validated sale.
	Provide your users with a unique Luxury product.
	Access to a dedicated team to help you boost your revenue.
	Located at the most picturesque destinations.

data.name: Jupiter Money [ Android , CPA ] IN
data.description:
Brief Description
Jupiter is a digital-first banking platform built to deliver a modern, intuitive banking experience tailored especially for young professionals and digitally savvy users. It combines financial tools, simple design, and convenience to help users manage their money smarter and with minimal friction.

Campaign Description
The campaign focuses on driving high-quality app installs and active user engagement by highlighting Jupiter’s effortless money management features.

Target Geo
More than 3000 pincodes covered pan-India, with complete pincode details available in the campaign brief.

data.name: TikTok Lite [Android, CPI/CPA] BR
data.name_aliases: tiktok, tik, took, Tiktok, tiiik, tikokot
data.description:
TikTok Lite BR

Benefits for Customers


	Fabulous content: Watch millions of videos selected specifically for you. TikTok Lite adapts to your tastes to keep you entertained with interesting content every day.
	Time-limited activity: Designed specifically for TikTok Lite users to complete challenging tasks and earn great rewards.
	Immersed experience: No e-commerce, the purest and fastest viewing experience, focusing only on what you intend to see.
	Data Saver: Save up to 20% on data usage.
	Smaller App Size: Only 13MB, perfect for devices with limited storage.
	Lower Data Usage: Optimized to consume less data, ideal for users with limited traffic or unstable network connections.
	Better Compatibility: Works on a wide range of devices, including older models or those with lower specifications.
	Reduced Load Times: Streamlined design and fewer features offer faster load times, enhancing the overall experience.


Target Audience Profile


	Gender: Both female and male
	Age Range: 18–60 years old
	Income Level: All
	Occupation: All
	Marital Status: All
	Other Criteria: Users interested in entertainment, short-form video content, and social media engagement


Brand Positioning Guidelines


	Publishers should highlight:
	Quality content: Emphasize the personalized, engaging video experience
	App performance: Lightweight, fast-loading, low data consumption
	User benefits: Time-limited challenges, rewards, immersive experience
	Recommended phrases: “Fabulous content,” “Data Saver,” “Immersed experience,” “Smaller App Size,” “Optimized for all devices”


Creative Approval


	Yes, only if publishers are creating video content on social media


Additional Rules or Restrictions


	Avoid inappropriate content, including sexual imagery, revealing clothing, violence, profanity, firearms (real or simulated), alcohol, tobacco, gambling, and politically or religiously sensitive topics.
	Use the correct brand name: Always write TikTok Lite correctly (e.g., avoid "tiktok Lite," "Tiktok Lite," etc.).
	Do not compare TikTok and TikTok Lite negatively: Avoid discrediting TikTok to promote TikTok Lite.
	Follow the TikTok Community Guidelines when creating promotional content.

data.name: GIA KARSKO EU
data.description:
Partner with GIA KARSKO – Authenticated Luxury for Your Audience

GIA KARSKO is a trusted destination for authenticated, pre-loved luxury designer handbags. Our curated selection includes iconic brands such as Hermès, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, and more—bringing premium, high-value products that appeal to luxury shoppers.

Affiliate Benefits


	Competitive commissions with no payout below €100
	30-day cookie window for maximized conversions
	High average order value of around €1,000+
	Dedicated affiliate support and guidance
	Professional marketing creatives and product imagery
	Real-time tracking and monthly payouts
	Custom-built Landing Pages for Affiliates


Join a program built on trust, authenticity, and shared success. Promote GIA KARSKO and offer your audience timeless luxury with exceptional earning potential.

Website:  https://giakarsko.com/

data.name: Lifestyle Web [CPS] IN
data.description:
Brand Description

Lifestyle Stores is a one-stop digital destination for modern living, offering a curated selection of fashion, beauty, home, and lifestyle essentials. Designed for style-conscious consumers, the brand brings together trend-led designs, quality products, and accessible pricing—all in one seamless online experience.

Campaign Description : This is a Web Based CPS Campaign . 

Target Geo :Pan India

data.name: Meshnology - Meshtastic & LoRa Hardware Specialist
data.name_aliases: Meshnology,Heltec, Meshtastic Power Bank, LoRa Nodes
data.description:
Meshnology is a fast-growing global cross-border e-commerce brand focused on Internet of Things (IoT) hardware and open-source technology products for makers, engineers, and tech enthusiasts. Our catalog includes LoRa and Meshtastic development boards and kits, high-capacity LiPo batteries, antennas, and accessory modules designed for IoT, DIY electronics, and long-range wireless communication.

By joining our affiliate program, partners worldwide can promote our products using unique coupons and earn commissions on real sales. We support creators, coupon sites, and content publishers with competitive commissions, flexible coupon incentives, and performance-based payouts. Meshnology delivers high-quality tech products that empower makers and innovators globally.
